summary: TL* THE CONTACT INQUIRED ABOUT A 2013 MAZDA CX-7. THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE VEHICLE EXPERIENCED A LACK OF ACCELERATION AND REDUCED ENGINE POWER. ALSO, THE TRACTION CONTROL WARNING INDICATOR ILLUMINATED. THE DEALER WAS NOT CONTACTED. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOT NOTIFIED. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS APPROXIMATELY 59,400.
